modal-np.title: Journeyer
modal-np.description: Just for applying, you gain access to our newsletter providing relevant info on the Pokemon market.

modal-trainer.title: Trainer Membership
modal-trainer.description: Includes 3 Monthly TCG booster packs of the current set being displayed on our visual list home page.

modal-champ.title: Champion Membership
modal-champ.description: Includes 1 featured Elite Trainer Box of the current set being displayed on our visual list home page, as well as discounts on vendor event passes.
